mil1:7.2: nihatapaccatthikaṁ → nihatapaccatthika (bj, pts-vp-pli1); nīhata (maku); nippaccatthikaṁ (mr) | varapavaragopuratoraṇaṁ → pavarapacuragopuratoraṇaṁ (bj)
mil1:7.3: vividhadānaggasatasamupasobhitaṁ → satatamupasobhitaṁ (mr) | vividhasamaṇabrāhmaṇasabhājanasaṅghaṭitaṁ → … sammābhājana … (mr); … samabhājana … (csp1ed) | bahuvidhavijjāvanta → … vijjādhara (mr) | naraciranisevitaṁ → naravīra … (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
